name: Feed Me (bloomingbridges, FlashX)
description:
A short game about getting work done, when there is a hungry feline in the apartment. Your little loved one is craving your attention, so make sure to look up from your screen every now and again.

We've been rushing to finish this in time for the jam deadline, expect a more fleshed out update in the coming days.

Based upon the My Famicase Exhibition 2020 artwork by Zach Roy.

Programming & Sound Design by FlashX, Art by bloomingbridges

ニャン

Update Log:

// v0.4 //

- Updated level with more details

- Fixed scoring and cat satisfaction meter

- First macOS Build!
